topic.title: Ocular Coded List Of Surgeries Section - conformance rules

ol.li: SHALL conform to IHE Coded Surgeries Section template (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.3.12)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry
Contains exactly one [1..1] IHE Procedure Entry (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.19)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] entry
Contains exactly one [1..1] IHE External Reference (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.4)
SHALL conform to CCD Procedures Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.12)
SHALL conform to IHE Surgeries Section template (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.3.11)
SHALL conform to IHE Coded Surgeries Section template (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.3.12)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="47519-4" History of procedures (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF-423, CONF-424)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] entry
Contains exactly one [1..1] External Reference (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.4)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] entry
Contains exactly one [1..1] Procedure Entry Procedure Activity Procedure (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.29)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] entry
Contains exactly one [1..1] IHE External Reference (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.4)
SHOULD satisfy: title is valued with a case-insensitive language-insensitive text string containing "procedures". (CONF-426)
SHOULD satisfy: include one or more of the following: ProcedureActivityAct, ProcedureActivityObservation, ProcedureActivityProcedure (CONF-419)

p.ph: Ocular Coded List Of Surgeries Section
